page.title: 14LOCAL EVENTS IN HOUSTON
page.content: Being a rural area, community events are an important part of village life. The local weekly paper,the {Renfrewshire Gazette,}carries a page devoted to the local happenings. This will include such things as public meetings, coffee mornings and jumble sales. Youth groups like scouts,guides and brigades feature frequently. {The major annual events are the church {carnival and the agricultural {show,}both taking place May/June. The carnival lasts one week and involves crazy sports and races. The Saturday ending the carnival has a parade and show in the park.The agricultural show draws people from a wide area and has many horse events and livestock judging. Another enjoyable event is bonfire night at Houston primary school. There are fireworks and a barbecue for all the residents.
